D . Gene B^Set^I Enrichment Analysis ( GSEA ) B^was^I performed to compare transcriptomes of genotype comparisons ( wt / Act vs wt / wt ; HPV8 / Act vs HPV8 / wt ; HPV8 / Act vs wt / wt , [ all ] / Act vs [ all ] / wt ) to 3 published datasets of Tumor - Associated Macrophages ( B^TAM^I ) ( Franklin et al . 2014 ; Ojalvo et al , 2009 ; Galletti et al , 2016 ) . Gene sets are composed of B^top^I genes upregulated ( B^TAM^I UP ) or downregulated ( B^TAM^I DOWN ) in B^TAM^I vs normal tissue macrophages . Positive Normalized Enrichment Score ( B^NES^I ) corresponds to enrichment of gene B^set^I in B^activin^I - upregulated genes ; negative B^NES^I corresponds to enrichment in B^activin^I - downregulated genes . Data are presented as pseudo - heatmap B^with^I magnitudes of B^NES^I color - coded as indicated in the legend ; all non - grey comparisons are FDR < 0 . 10 . 
E . Differential GSEA B^was^I performed on combined genotype comparison [ all ] / Act vs [ all ] / wt and two datasets of human B^AK^I vs normal skin ( GSE2503 ; Nindl et al , 2006 ) and GSE63107 to compare these transcriptomes to gene sets derived from B^top^I upregulated genes in these datasets ( B^top^I ) ; and gene sets derived from B^top^I upregulated genes in datasets of differential human macrophage activation ( IFN - γ , B^TNF^I - α , LPS , IL - 4 vs non - treated ) and selected human myeloid / lymphoid cell type - specific gene expression profiles ( macrophage vs monocyte , dendritic cell , and T - cell ) ( Xue et al , 2014 ; bottom ) . Activin target genes enriched in the B^AK^I transcriptomes are shown ( right ) . Data are presented as pseudo - heatmaps B^with^I magnitudes of Normalized Enrichment Scores ( B^NES^I ) and Log2 ( Fold Change ) color - coded as indicated in the respective legends ; all non - grey comparisons are FDR < 0 . 05 B^for^I B^NES^I and p < 0 . 10 B^for^I Fold Change .

Distribution of peptides containing sulfhydrated cysteine residues relative to their H / L ratios as determined by the BTA analysis of cell extracts isolated from C1 and B^P1^I patient cells ( indicated in A ) and C2 and B^P4^I fibroblasts ( B ) .  ( b ) Kinematics of the embryo surface . A kymograph of the embryo surface ( φ axis ) from a B^Tg^I ( β - B^actin^I : m - GFP ) embryo shows the continuous displacement of the B^EVL^I / yolk margin , which accelerates after 50 % epiboly , while the yolk cell B^membrane^I does B^not^I show any shift ( see Movie EV1 ) . ( c ) Theoretical kymograph from 50 % to 70 % epiboly superimposed , between the B^red^I lines , on the experimental kymograph ( b ) . Membrane signal intensity is color - coded ( B^blue^I to B^red^I ) . B^White^I arrowheads point to flow lines ( black ) . 
 ( d ) AV velocities , normalized to B^EVL^I / yolk margin velocity , were measured by PIV of time - lapse recordings of the surface of lectin - soaked embryos . The plots correspond to three different epiboly stages ( 30 % , B^blue^I ; 60 % , B^red^I ; and 90 % , green ) . Blue and B^red^I arrows point to the width of the E - YSL at 30 and 60 % epiboly respectively ( from Appendix Figure S1 ) . 
 ( e ) The yolk cell B^membrane^I is highly convoluted ( B^white^I brackets ) ahead of the B^EVL^I leading cells and condenses over time . B^Tg^I ( β - B^actin^I : m - GFP ) embryo at 30 % ( left ) and 60 % ( right ) epiboly . Scale B^bar^I 25 μm . Inset shows a high magnification of the wrinkled area ( arrowhead ) . Scale B^bar^I 10 μm . 
 ( f ) B^Actin^I accumulates within wrinkles at the E - YSL . The yolk cell B^membrane^I of LifeAct - GFP injected embryos ( B^actin^I - green ) B^was^I stained B^with^I lectin - TRITC ( B^red^I ) ( B^top^I ) . Orthogonal projection of the wrinkled area ( bottom ) . Wrinkles are outlined B^with^I a B^white^I B^dotted^I line . Scale B^bar^I 2 μm . 
 ( a ) Yolk granules flow in stereotyped patterns as epiboly progresses . PIV of time - lapse snapshots imaged by two - photon microscopy of a B^Tg^I ( β - B^actin^I : m - GFP ) embryo ( from Movie EV2 ) . Upon epiboly onset , yolk granules flow towards the animal B^pole^I displaying two internal vortices near the E - YSL . At 50 % , the movement of the yolk granules halts , B^but^I resumes afterwards until the B^end^I of epiboly . Animal ( A ) and vegetal ( V ) poles are indicated . Scale B^bar^I 100 μm . ( b ) Internal yolk content speed ( μm / B^min^I ) at the center of the embryo , over time ( B^min^I ) . Inset : Spherical coordinates . The main axis of the sphere is represented by z , from the animal to the vegetal B^pole^I . The polar angle is represented by φ and the radial coordinate is denoted ρ . ( c ) Vortex midpoints distance from the center ( ρ ) , over time ( B^min^I ) . ( d ) Vortex midpoints position in relation to the φ axis , over time ( B^min^I ) . Black lines represent individual measurements . Red lines represent averages . ( e ) Correlation between vortex displacement ( B^blue^I , average of n = 3 embryos ) vs . B^EVL^I margin displacement ( B^red^I , average of n = 4 embryos ) along the main axis ( z ) , over time ( B^min^I ) . Standard Errors are displayed . Arrow points to 50 % epiboly . 
 ( a ) Yolk microrheology . Mean squared displacement ( B^MSD^I ) of thermal fluctuations of fluorescent nanoparticles embedded in the yolk of zebrafishembryos . Solid and dashed black lines are Mean ± Standard Error computed from 99 particles . Red line is the B^fit^I of the Stokes - Einstein equation . B^MSD^I of nanoparticles embedded in the yolk exhibits a proportional dependence on time lag , Δt , consistent B^with^I a Newtonian liquid behavior B^with^I a viscosity of 129 mPa·s . A linear time dependence of B^MSD^I B^with^I similar values of yolk viscosity has been recently reported in Drosophila ( He et al . , 2014 ) . Interestingly , the viscosity of the zebrafish yolk is two orders of magnitude lower than that of C . elegansembryos ( Daniels et al . , 2006 ) and of the cytoplasm of several cell types ( Wirtz , 2009 ) . 
 ( b ) Viscoelasticity of the yolk cortex . Effective complex modulus ( g * ) measured by indenting the surface of zebrafishembryos B^with^I B^AFM^I . Red symbols are the elastic modulus ( g ' ) and yellow symbols are the viscous modulus ( g ' ' ) , respectively . Standard Errors are displayed . In all the measured frequencies cortex rheology is dominated by a solid - like behavior B^with^I the viscous modulus 5 times lower that the elastic modulus . No significant frequency dependence B^was^I found in the elastic ( ANOVA , p = 0 . 123 ) and viscous modulus ( ANOVA , p = 0 . 719 ) . 
 ( c ) Flow lines from snapshots of the PIV measurements ( at 40 , 60 and 80 % epiboly ) of a two - photon video time - lapse ( from Movie EV4 ) of a B^Tg^I ( β - B^actin^I : m - GFP ) embryo ( B^top^I ) . Fitted flow lines using B^HR^I ar shown at the bottom . The relative mean B^square^I errors ( RMSE ) of the fitting are displayed as a percentage at the bottom left of each panel . Scale B^bar^I 100 μm . 
 ( d ) Mechanical power maps over time obtained by B^HR^I of the same embryos as in ( c ) ( from Movie EV5 ) . The RMSE of the power is shown as a percentage at the bottom left of each panel . The mechanical work to produce doming ( 40 % epiboly ) arises mainly at the blastoderm ( left ) ; at 60 % epiboly ( middle ) DCs undergo ingression ( B^red^I ) while the E - YSL resists constriction ( B^blue^I ) . At 80 % epiboly ( right ) , the active work leading to the active movement of the B^EVL^I / yolk margin mainly maps at the E - YSL ( B^red^I ) while the blastoderm undergoes elastic resistance ( B^blue^I ) . B^White^I arrows point to the main observed events . Scale B^bar^I 100 μm . 
 ( e ) AV ( B^red^I ) and CC ( green ) stresses and their differences ( B^blue^I ) normalized values in arbitrary units from the regression analysis ( Movie EV6 ) were plotted as a function of the φ angle ( 0 - 1 ) along the cortex from animal to vegetal . The equator - B^dotted^I yellow line - , yolk surface - purple shadow - and the RMSE of the mechanical pressure as a percentage B^for^I each time point are displayed ( 40 % ; 60 % ; 80 % epiboly ) . The CC stress steeps up from animal to vegetal and the AV shows a more complex profile . Their difference changes senses around the B^EVL^I / yolk margin . 
 ( a ) Correlation between the differential tension ( cyan ) represented by the recoil velocities differences ( m / s ) between CC and AV laser cuts and their difference ( B^blue^I ) calculated by regression analysis at the E - YSL during epiboly ( % ) . The difference values in normalized relative units were fitted applying a constant adjustment ratio at all time points . 
 ( b ) AV tension ( averaged recoil velocity in m / s ) in the yolk cortex at different distances from the B^EVL^I ( 0 , 10 , 20 , 40 and 60 m ) and at different epiboly stages ( 50 % , B^blue^I ; 60 - 70 % , B^red^I ; 80 % epiboly , green ) . Significance changes are highlighted and Standard Errors are displayed . 
 ( c ) Probing mechanical parameters of living embryos B^with^I B^AFM^I . Force - indentation curves recorded at cantilever velocity of 10 m / s ( B^blue^I ) fitted B^with^I a " liquid balloon " model ( B^red^I ) . Inset : B^AFM^I force - indentation description . 
 ( d ) Averaged values of mean surface tension ( pN / μm ) on the yolk obtained B^with^I B^AFM^I at different epiboly stages ( left ) , and the significant difference of tension at 60 - 70 % epiboly ( p = 0 . 0245 ) between the E - YSL and the vegetal B^pole^I ( right ) . Standard Errors are displayed . 
 ( a ) Kymograph showing the deformation of the cortex along a segment perpendicular to a laser B^cut^I ( B^red^I line time point ) in the E - YSL of a Myosin - GFP transgenic embryo [ B^Tg^I ( β - B^actin^I : myl 12 . 1 - e - GFP ) ] . After a rapid opening , an active contraction displaces the B^cut^I centroid vegetalward indicating that the B^EVL^I is more easily stretched ( elastic ) than the vegetal yolk cell B^membrane^I / cortex . When the B^gap^I is closed , the B^cut^I center returns to its initial position and the elastic equilibrium is restored . Scale B^bar^I 10 μm . 
 ( d ) Dynamic simulation of AV and CC stresses normalized values in arbitrary units ( from Movie EV9 - 40 % ; 65 % ; 80 % epiboly ) represented as in Figure 1a . The AV and CC stresses are equal at the poles , as the epiboly simulation progresses , the CC stress steeps up from animal to vegetal and the difference between CC and AV stresses change sense at the B^EVL^I / yolk margin . 
 ( a ) Speed of the B^EVL^I advancing front at different epiboly stages ( φ angle ) B^for^I two distinct simulated conditions : 1 ) a difference of elastic tension between the B^EVL^I and the yolk associated to a two - phase reduction of the contractile E - YSL width ( from 20º to 5º ) as epiboly advances ( from 50º to 155º ) ( wild type - B^blue^I ) . The contractile E - YSL width decreases at a slower rate until 80º and shrinks afterwards at a rate 2 . 25 times faster , and 2 ) Same assumptions as in 1 B^but^I B^with^I no shrinkage of the E - YSL ( constant 20º ) ( contractileless - B^red^I ) . 
 ( b ) Experimental values B^for^I the B^EVL^I advancing front speeds at different epiboly stages ( φ angle - B^top^I ) and at different times ( bottom ) B^for^I wild type controls ( B^blue^I ) and Msn1 yolk morphants B^with^I reduced E - YSL contractility ( B^red^I ) . Experimental profiles closely approach to those inferred in the simulations ( compare to ( a ) ) . 
 ( c ) Timeline showing medial sections and power isolines B^for^I wild type ( B^top^I ) and Msn1 yolk morphants ( bottom ) along epiboly . Mechanical parameters were inferred by B^HR^I from experimental velocity fields ( Movie EV10 ) . The RMSE of power is shown as a percentage at each time point . DCs in the Msn1 yolk morphants undergo ingression on schedule at 50 % epiboly ( yellow arrow ) . Importantly , as in wild type controls , the active work in morphants is detected at the E - YSL ( B^red^I arrow ) . This power supply fades away as epiboly slows down and eventually fails . Scale B^bar^I 100 μm . 
 ( d ) Tensional profiles normalized values in arbitrary units inferred by B^HR^I B^for^I wild type at 80 % epiboly and its temporal equivalent ( 9 hours after B^egg^I laying ) B^for^I Msn1 yolk morphants . The characteristic profiles of longitudinal and latitudinal stresses and the animal to vegetal stress gradient that are built up during epiboly are never properly developed in morphants . 
A . Sorbitol stimulates YAP phosphorylation . HEK293A cells were cultured in the presence or absence of serum , and treated B^with^I 0 . 2 M sorbitol B^for^I the indicated time points . Phos - B^tag^I gel B^was^I used to assess total YAP phosphorylation based on mobility shift . Note that YAP and B^TAZ^I are recognized by the same antibody . l . e . denotes long exposure of YAP and B^TAZ^I . 
B . Osmotic stress induces LATS phosphorylation . HEK293A cells were treated B^with^I 0 . 2 M sorbitol B^for^I 30 or 60 minutes in the presence or absence of serum . LATS phosphorylation at the hydrophobic motif ( HM ) B^was^I detected B^with^I the phospho - specific pLATS antibody . 
C . Osmotic stress increases LATS kinase activity . HEK293A cells were treated B^with^I 0 . 2 M sorbitol B^for^I 30 minutes . B^Lats1^I B^was^I immunoprecipitated and an in vitro kinase assay B^was^I performed using recombinant B^GST^I - YAP as a substrate . Phosphorylation of YAP B^was^I determined by immunoblotting B^with^I phospho - YAP ( S127 ) antibody . Data are presented as mean ± SEM . * p < 0 . 05 ( two tailed student ' s t - test , n = 3 ) . 
D . Osmotic stress does B^not^I lead to YAP cytoplasmic localization . HEK293A cells were treated B^with^I 0 . 2 M sorbitol B^for^I 1 hr in the presence of serum . YAP subcellular localization B^was^I determined by immunofluorescence staining ( B^red^I ) . DAPI ( B^blue^I ) B^was^I used to stain B^for^I DNA . Scale B^bar^I : 20 μm . Quantification of more nuclear ( N > C ) or more cytosolic ( N < C ) YAP signal is determined B^with^I randomly chosen fields , each B^with^I approximately 100 cells . 
E . Osmotic stress does B^not^I reduce YAP target gene expression . HEK293A cells were treated B^with^I 0 . 2 M sorbitol B^for^I 4 hr . mRNA levels of B^CTGF^I and B^CYR61^I were measured by quantitative RT - B^PCR^I and normalized to B^GAPDH^I control . Data are presented as mean ± SEM . n . s means p > 0 . 05 ( two tailed student ' s t - test , n = 3 ) . 
F . Osmotic stress does B^not^I disrupt the interaction between YAP and B^TEAD1^I . HEK293A cells were treated B^with^I 0 . 2 M sorbitol B^for^I 1 hr . Endogenous YAP B^was^I immunoprecipitated B^with^I YAP antibody , and B^TEAD1^I and YAP were detected by Western B^blot^I . Cells were serum starved B^for^I 1 hr as indicated ( - serum ) . 
G . Osmotic stress does B^not^I increase the interaction between YAP and 14 - 3 - 3 . HEK293A cells were transiently transfected B^with^I Flag - YAP and B^Myc^I - 14 - 3 - 3 , then treated B^with^I 0 . 2 M sorbitol B^for^I the indicated time points . B^Myc^I - 14 - 3 - 3 B^was^I immunoprecipitated and the co - precipitated Flag - YAP B^was^I detected . 
A . Osmotic stress induces YAP nuclear translocation . HEK293A cells were serum starved B^for^I 1 hr followed by 0 . 2 M sorbitol treatment B^for^I 1 hr . YAP / B^TAZ^I ( B^red^I , upper panels ) or YAP ( B^red^I , lower panels ) were stained B^with^I two specific antibodies . DAPI ( B^blue^I ) B^was^I used to visualize cell nuclei . Scale B^bar^I : 20 μm . Quantification of more nuclear ( N > C ) or more cytosolic ( N < C ) YAP signal is determined B^with^I randomly chosen fields . 
B . Osmotic stress induces B^TAZ^I nuclear translocation . YAP knockout ( KO ) HEK293A cells were serum starved B^for^I 1 hr followed by 0 . 2 M sorbitol treatment B^for^I 1 hr . B^TAZ^I localization B^was^I determined by immunofluorescence staining B^with^I the YAP / B^TAZ^I antibody ( B^red^I ) . Scale B^bar^I : 20 μm . 
C . Osmotic stress induces a transient YAP nuclear translocation . HEK293A cells were serum starved B^for^I 1 hr followed by 0 . 2 M sorbitol treatment B^for^I the indicated time points . 
D . Osmotic stress induces YAP target gene expression . Wild type ( WT ) or YAP / B^TAZ^I B^double^I knockout ( Y / T KO ) HEK293A cells were serum starved B^for^I 1 hr and treated B^with^I 0 . 2 M sorbitol B^for^I 4 hr . mRNA levels of B^CTGF^I and B^CYR61^I were measured by quantitative RT - B^PCR^I and normalized to B^GAPDH^I control . Data are presented as mean ± SEM . * p < 0 . 05 ( two tailed student ' s t - test , n = 3 ) . 
E . Osmotic stress decreases YAP and 14 - 3 - 3 interaction . HEK293A cells were transiently transfected B^with^I Flag - YAP and B^Myc^I - 14 - 3 - 3 , and were serum starved B^for^I 16 hr . Cells were then treated B^with^I 0 . 2 M sorbitol B^for^I the indicated time points . B^Myc^I - 14 - 3 - 3 B^was^I immunoprecipitated and the associated Flag - YAP B^was^I detected by Western . Data are presented as mean ± SEM . * p < 0 . 05 ( two tailed student ' s t - test , n = 3 ) . 
A . Inhibition of B^p38^I or JNK does B^not^I block osmotic stress - induced YAP nuclear localization . HEK293A cells were pretreated B^with^I 2 μM B^p38^I inhibitor ( SB203580 ) or 20 μM JNK inhibitor ( SP600125 ) before treatment B^with^I 0 . 2 M sorbitol B^for^I 1 hr in the absence of serum . Quantification of YAP / B^TAZ^I subcellular staining is shown . Scale B^bar^I : 20 μm . 
A . Inhibition of B^p38^I or JNK does B^not^I block osmotic stress - induced YAP nuclear localization . HEK293A cells were pretreated B^with^I 2 μM B^p38^I inhibitor ( SB203580 ) or 20 μM JNK inhibitor ( SP600125 ) before treatment B^with^I 0 . 2 M sorbitol B^for^I 1 hr in the absence of serum . Cell lysates from identically treated samples were examined B^for^I phosphorylation of B^p38^I substrate B^MK^I - 2 and JNK substrate c - B^Jun^I . 
B . B^NLK^I knockout blocks osmotic stress - induced YAP nuclear localization . HEK293A cells were transiently transfected B^with^I CRISPR / Cas9 to knockout B^NLK^I . Wild type ( WT ) cells and the B^NLK^I KO cell pool were treated B^with^I 0 . 2 M sorbitol B^for^I 1 hr in the absence of serum . YAP / B^TAZ^I subcellular localization B^was^I determined by immunofluorescence staining . Scale B^bar^I : 20 μm . 
C . B^NLK^I induces YAP nuclear translocation . HEK293A cells were co - transfected B^with^I Flag - YAP together B^with^I vector control , B^Myc^I - B^NLK^I - WT ( wild type B^NLK^I ) , or B^NLK^I - KN ( kinase negative mutant ) . Cells were serum starved B^for^I 6 hr , and YAP localization and B^NLK^I expression were determined by Flag ( green ) and B^Myc^I ( B^red^I ) antibodies , respectively . Scale B^bar^I : 20 μm . 
D . B^NLK^I induces YAP phosphorylation . B^HA^I - YAP B^was^I co - transfected B^with^I B^NLK^I - WT or B^NLK^I - KN in HEK293A cells . The phos - B^tag^I gel showed B^NLK^I - WT B^but^I B^not^I B^NLK^I - KN caused a significant mobility shift of YAP . 
E . B^NLK^I phosphorylates YAP in vitro . B^NLK^I - WT and B^NLK^I - KN were immunoprecipitated from HEK293A cells and an in vitro kinase assay B^was^I performed using recombinant B^GST^I - YAP as a substrate in the presence of ATP - γ - S . Total phosphorylation of YAP B^was^I detected by immunoblotting B^with^I thiophosphate ester antibody , which identifies the alkylated thiophosphorylation on YAP . 
A . B^NLK^I induces YAP B^Ser^I 128 phosphorylation . Flag - YAP WT or S128A mutant B^was^I co - transfected B^with^I or without B^Myc^I - B^NLK^I . Phosphorylation B^was^I determined by Western B^blot^I using YAP S128 phosphospecific antibody . 
B . B^NLK^I phosphorylates YAP B^Ser^I 128 in vitro . B^NLK^I - WT or B^NLK^I - KN B^was^I transfected into HEK293A cells and immunoprecipitated . An in vitro B^NLK^I kinase assay B^was^I performed using recombinant B^GST^I - YAP as a substrate . Phosphorylation of YAP B^Ser^I 128 B^was^I determined by immunoblotting B^with^I phospho - YAP ( S128 ) antibody . 
C . Osmotic stress induces YAP phosphorylation at B^Ser^I 128 . In the left panel , HEK293A cells were treated B^with^I sorbitol and endogenous YAP B^was^I immunoprecipitated . In the right panel , Flag - YAP B^was^I transfected into HEK293A cells . Flag - YAP B^was^I immunoprecipitated , YAP B^Ser^I 128 phosphorylation B^was^I detected by a phosphospecific antibody . Data are presented as mean ± SEM . * p < 0 . 05 ( two tailed student ' s t - test , n = 3 ) . 
D . B^NLK^I deficiency reduces YAP S128 phosphorylation . Two CRISPR / CAS9 gRNA plasmids targeting different sites of B^NLK^I were transfected into HEK293A . WT cells and two pools of B^NLK^I CRISPR / CAS9 transfected cells were treated B^with^I 0 . 2 M sorbitol B^for^I the indicated time points . Data are presented as mean ± SEM . * p < 0 . 05 ( two tailed student ' s t - test , n = 4 ) . 
E . The S128D phosphomimetic mutant abolishes YAP interaction B^with^I 14 - 3 - 3 . Flag - YAP WT and mutant constructs were co - transfected B^with^I B^Myc^I - 14 - 3 - 3 into HEK293A cells . Cells were serum starved B^for^I 16 hrs . 14 - 3 - 3 B^was^I immunoprecipitated B^with^I B^Myc^I antibody and the associated YAP B^was^I detected B^with^I Flag antibody . 
F . YAP B^Ser^I 128 phosphorylation is required B^for^I disruption of YAP - 14 - 3 - 3 interaction by osmotic stress . Flag - YAP WT or Flag - YAP S128A constructs were co - transfected B^with^I B^Myc^I - 14 - 3 - 3 into HEK293A cells . Cells were serum starved B^for^I 16 hrs , and treated B^with^I 0 . 2 M sorbitol B^for^I the indicated time points or refreshed B^with^I serum containing medium B^for^I 1 hr . Refreshing medium served as a control to disrupt YAP and 14 - 3 - 3 binding . 14 - 3 - 3 B^was^I immunoprecipitated B^with^I B^Myc^I antibody , and the associated YAP B^was^I detected B^with^I Flag antibody . Data are presented as mean ± SEM . * p < 0 . 05 ( two tailed student ' s t - test , n = 3 ) . 
A . B^NLK^I does B^not^I induce nuclear translocation of the S128A mutant YAP . HEK293A cells were co - transfected B^with^I B^Myc^I - B^NLK^I and Flag - YAP WT or S128A mutant . Cells were serum starved B^for^I 6 hr , and YAP localization and B^NLK^I expression were determined by Flag ( green ) and B^Myc^I ( B^red^I ) antibodies , respectively . Scale B^bar^I : 20 μm .

 ( B ) Individualized XO8 GSCs were transduced B^with^I lentiviral shRNAs against B^ATF3^I or control as described in Materials and Methods . After four days , individualized GSCs were treated B^with^I 50 nM MG132 , and subjected to immunoblotting . 
 ( C ) XO8 GSCs were transfected B^with^I control or B^CHOP^I siRNA B^for^I 48 hrs and then treated B^with^I 50 nM MG132 B^for^I 24 hrs . Cell viability B^was^I determined using the Trypan B^blue^I exclusion assay . Error bars represent the mean ± B^SD^I from three independent experiments ( * P < 0 . 05 , n = 3 ) . B^For^I statistical analysis , student t - test ( two - sided , one type ) were used . 
 ( D ) Immunoblotting analysis of ( C ) . The cells were collected , lysed , and subjected to immunoblot analysis B^with^I indicated antibodies . 
 ( E ) Wild - type and B^CHOP^I - / - MEF cells were treated B^with^I MG132 B^for^I 24 hrs . Cell viability B^was^I determined using trypan B^blue^I exclusion assay . Error bars represent the mean ± B^SD^I from three separate experiments ( * P < 0 . 05 , n = 3 ) . B^For^I statistical analysis , student t - test ( two - sided , one type ) were used . 
 ( F ) Cell lysates obtained in ( E ) were subjected to immunoblot analysis B^with^I anti - B^PARP^I - 1 , anti - B^CHOP^I or anti - B^ATF3^I antibody . 
 ( G ) The expression of NOXA B^was^I assessed B^with^I real - time B^PCR^I using total RNA extracted from XO8 GSCs treated B^with^I 50 nM MG132 alone or in combination B^with^I each inhibitor of B^ER^I stress - driven apoptosis ( salubrinal ; 15 µM , STK064652 ; 20 µM , STK047915 ; 20 µM ) . The mean + S . D . values from the three independent experiments are shown after normalization to that of control cells treated B^with^I DMSO . B^For^I statistical analysis , student t - test ( two - sided , one type ) B^was^I used . * P value : salubrinal , 0 . 0003 ; STK064650 , 0 . 0036 ; STK047915 , 0 . 0019 . 
 ( H ) Similar to ( G ) except that XO8 B^GSC^I transduced B^with^I lentiviral shRNAs were treated B^with^I MG132 . The mean + S . D . values from the three independent experiments are shown after normalization to that of control cells treated B^with^I DMSO . B^For^I statistical analysis , student t - test ( two - sided , one type ) B^was^I used . * P value : # 1 , 0 . 026 ; # 5 , 0 . 0033 ; # 6 , 0 . 0482 . 
 ( I ) XO8 GSCs were treated B^with^I 20 nM MG132 alone or in combination B^with^I each inhibitor as described in ( C ) , and subjected to immunoblotting . Sal . : salubrinal . 
 ( A and B ) XO8 GSCs were subcutaneously ( s . c . ) injected in the flank of mice . When the tumor volume reached approximately 180 mm3 , B^GSC^I - bearing mice were administered intraperitoneally ( i . p . ) B^with^I 1 mg / kg MG132 and 10 mg / kg B^STK^I alone or in combination on every day B^for^I 2 weeks . Tumors were dissected from the subcutaneous regions of nude mice . Inset picture shows the tumor in respective group . Therapeutic effects were monitored using bioluminescence imaging . ( C ) The B^bar^I diagram represents the tumor volumes . ( D ) Tumor weights were determined at the B^end^I of the study . ( E ) The tumor sizes in each group were determined by histological analysis at day 21 after tumor inoculation . 
 ( F ) XO10 B^GSC^I were orthotopically injected into the brains of BALB / c nude mice . STK047915 , MG132 , or both were injected intraperitoneally to GSCs - bearing mice at day 14 after XO10 ( 5×105 cells ) inoculation . The PBS B^was^I used as a control . Representative photographs of H&E staining from each group show tumor growth . Magnification , ×1 . 
A . B^NLK^I B^but^I B^not^I kinase - negative B^NLK^I ( Flag - B^NLK^I - KM ; K155M ) caused mobility shift of EGFP - YAP . EGFP - YAP B^was^I transfected B^with^I empty vector , Flag - B^NLK^I - WT , or Flag - B^NLK^I - KM into HEK293T cells . Mobility shift B^was^I shown by immunoblotting . 
B . B^NLK^I phosphorylates YAP in vitro . Flag - B^NLK^I - WT , or Flag - B^NLK^I - KM B^was^I immunoprecipitated B^with^I anti - Flag antibody from cell lysates of HEK293T cells transfected B^with^I each plasmid and subjected to in vitro kinase assay B^with^I bacterially purified B^GST^I - YAP in the presence of [ 32P - ATP ] . Phosphorylation of B^GST^I - YAP and autophosphorylation of B^NLK^I were examined by autoradiography ( B^top^I panel ) , and Coomassie Blue staining showed similar levels of B^GST^I - YAP and Flag - B^NLK^I ( bottom panel ) . 
C . B^NLK^I interacts B^with^I YAP at the endogenous level . Immunoprecipitates from HEK293T cell lysates B^with^I indicated antibody were blotted B^with^I anti - YAP or anti - B^NLK^I antibody . 
B . B^NLK^I - WT B^but^I B^not^I B^NLK^I - KM reduces Ser127 phosphorylation of endogenous YAP . Cell lysates from HEK293 cells transfected B^with^I empty vector ( - ) , Flag - B^NLK^I - WT , or Flag - B^NLK^I - KM were immunoblotted B^with^I antibodies shown in the figure ( left panel ) . The ratio of p - YAP ( S127 ) or p - YAP ( S397 ) / total - YAP of three independent western blots B^was^I quantified ( right panel ) . Data are presented as mean ± sem . * * P < 0 . 01 . Student t - test B^was^I used B^for^I statistical analysis . 
C . Deficiency of B^NLK^I leads to increased YAP phosphorylation at Ser127 . Lysates from wild type and two independent B^NLK^I knockout HEK293 cells were immunoblotted B^with^I antibodies indicated in the figure ( left panel ) . The ratio of p - YAP ( S127 ) or p - YAP ( S397 ) / total - YAP of three independent western blots B^was^I quantified ( right panel ) . Data are presented as mean ± sem . * P < 0 . 05 and * * P < 0 . 01 . Student t - test B^was^I used B^for^I statistical analysis . 
D . Ectopic expression of B^NLK^I attenuates YAP phosphorylation at Ser127 while increases phosphorylation at Ser128 . Cell lysates from HEK293 cells transfected B^with^I empty vector ( - ) , Flag - B^NLK^I - WT , or Flag - B^NLK^I - KM were immunoblotted B^with^I antibodies shown in the figure . 
E . Substitution of Ser127 B^with^I alanine enhances phosphorylation at Ser128 , and vice versa . Cell lysates from HEK293T cells transfected B^with^I empty vector ( - ) , EGFP - YAP , EGFP - YAP - S127A , or EGFP - YAP - S128A were immunoblotted B^with^I antibodies shown in the figure .

C . Downregulation of nemo B^with^I RNAi achieved in the posterior compartment of wing imaginal discs ( co - expression of GFP serves to mark the posterior compartment ) using the hh - Gal4 driver results in decreased expression of the Yorkie target gene DIAP1 . D . Yorkie is epistatic to Nemo : co - overexpression of the constitutively active mutant B^yki^I [ S168A ] together B^with^I B^nmo^I - RNAi produces typical B^yki^I [ S168A ] phenotypes : severe overgrowth of the affected area B^with^I concomitant increase in B^yki^I target gene expression ( DIAP1 ) . Due to lethality of the hh - Gal4 - driven co - overexpression , another posterior driver en - Gal4 B^was^I used instead ; anti - Hh staining ( green ) B^was^I used to mark the posterior compartment ( left panel ) . Posterior DIAP1 levels in UAS - RNAi - nemo ; en - Gal4 are also significantly different from control UAS - GFP ; en - Gal4 discs ( right panel ) . Data are presented as mean ± sem . * * * P < 0 . 005 . Student t - test B^was^I used B^for^I statistical analysis ( right ) . Scale bars : 50 µm .

 ( A ) Chromosome 7 of S . bayanus is incompatible B^with^I the S . cerevisiae genome . The chromosome 7 replacement stain ( Sc + Sb - chr7 ) exhibited serious growth defects when grown on the non - fermentable carbon source ( glycerol ) . The respiration defects could be partially rescued when a whole B^set^I of S . bayanus chromosomes were provided ( Sc + Sb - chr7 x Sb - ρ⁰ ) , or fully rescued B^with^I the addition of S . bayanus mtDNA ( Sc + Sb - chr7 - ρ⁰ x Sb ) . Cell cultures were serially - diluted and spotted onto YPD ( glucose ) or YPG ( glycerol ) plates . The plates were then incubated at 28 °C until colonies were easily observed . Sc , S . cerevisiae . Sb , S . bayanus . ρ⁰ , mtDNA - less strains . 
 ( B ) Ectopically - expressing Sc - B^CCM1^I rescues the respiration defect of Sc + Sb - chr7 . Spot assays B^for^I the wild - type S . cerevisiae ( Sc ) and the chromosome 7 replacement stain ( Sc + Sb - chr7 ) carrying an empty plasmid ( + vector ) or the plasmid B^with^I the S . cerevisiae B^CCM1^I gene ( + Sc - B^CCM1^I ) . 
 ( C ) Sb - B^CCM1^I incompatibility could only be rescued in the presence of S . bayanus mtDNA . The native B^CCM1^I B^ORF^I in S . cerevisiae B^was^I replaced by either Sb - B^CCM1^I ( Sc + Sb - B^CCM1^I ) or Sc - B^CCM1^I ( Sc + Sc - B^CCM1^I , as a control ) coding regions . Crossing the Sc + Sb - B^CCM1^I strain B^with^I the mtDNA - less Sb - ρ⁰ strain ( Sc + Sb - B^CCM1^I x Sb - ρ⁰ ) could B^not^I rescue the growth defect . 
 ( D ) B^CCM1^I incompatibility is symmetric between S . cerevisiae and S . bayanus . The B^CCM1^I B^ORF^I in S . bayanus B^was^I replaced by either Sc - B^CCM1^I ( Sb + Sc - B^CCM1^I ) or Sb - B^CCM1^I ( Sb + Sb - B^CCM1^I , as a control ) coding regions . Only the Sb + Sc - B^CCM1^I strain exhibited respiration defects and the defect could B^not^I be rescued even when a whole B^set^I of S . cerevisiae chromosomes were provided ( Sb + Sc - B^CCM1^I x Sc - ρ⁰ ) . 
 ( E ) B^CCM1^I incompatibility probably occurred during the divergence between S . bayanus and the common ancestor of S . cerevisiae , S . paradoxus , S . mikatae and S . kudriavzevii . The endogenous B^CCM1^I in S . cerevisiae B^was^I replaced B^with^I its orthologous alleles from other Saccharomyces sensu stricto yeasts . Only the strain carrying S . bayanus B^CCM1^I displayed growth defects on glycerol - containing plates . 
 ( A ) Sb - Ccm1 protein is transported efficiently to S . cerevisiae mitochondria . Total cell extracts ( total ) , cytosolic fractions ( cyto ) or mitochondrial fractions ( mito ) were hybridized B^with^I different antibodies to detect the proteins . B^G6PDH^I ( glucose - 6 - phosphate dehydrogenase ) and B^Cox2^I served as cytosolic and mitochondrial markers , respectively . Both Sc - Ccm1 and Sb - Ccm1 were fused B^with^I c - B^Myc^I at the C - terminus and expressed from a single - copy plasmid . The B^Myc^I - tagged Ccm1 proteins consistently appeared as B^double^I bands , which were probably due to some unknown protein modifications . 
 ( B ) The level of B^15S rRNA^I is reduced in Sc + Sb - B^CCM1^I cells . RNA isolated from Sc + Sb - B^CCM1^I ( labeled as Sb ) or Sc + Sc - B^CCM1^I ( labeled as Sc ) cells B^was^I hybridized B^with^I gene - specific probes using Northern blots . 
 ( C ) Sb - Ccm1 interacts weakly B^with^I S . cerevisiae B^15S rRNA^I . The level of Ccm1 - bound B^15S rRNA^I B^was^I measured using quantitative B^PCR^I analysis following mitochondrial RNA immunoprecipitation of S . cerevisiae cells expressing Sc - B^CCM1^I - 13Myc or Sb - B^CCM1^I - 13 B^Myc^I . Data B^was^I normalized to the control group without the B^Myc^I B^tag^I to obtain the relative fold enrichment . Graph B^was^I plotted using data from three independent repeats B^for^I each strain and p value B^was^I calculated by unpaired , two - sided student t - test . Error bars indicate S . D . * * * , p value < 0 . 001 . 
 ( D ) Overexpressing Sb - B^CCM1^I rescues the respiration defect of Sc + Sb - B^CCM1^I cells . Cell cultures were serially - diluted and spotted onto YPD ( glucose ) or YPG ( glycerol ) plates . The plates were then incubated at 28 °C until colonies were easily observed . 
 ( E ) The steady - state level of mtDNA - encoded proteins is reduced in Sc + Sb - B^CCM1^I cells . Immunoblotting B^for^I the mitochondrial proteins in Sc + Sb - B^CCM1^I ( labeled as Sb ) or Sc + Sc - B^CCM1^I ( labeled as Sc ) cells . Cox1 , B^Cox2^I and B^Cox3^I are mtDNA - encoded complex B^IV^I subunits . B^Tom20^I is a nucleus - encoded mitochondrial protein . 
 ( A ) Tetrad analysis reveals that the respiration defect of Sc + Sb - B^CCM1^I cells B^can^I be rescued by mutations in mitochondrial or nuclear genomes . The suppressor clones were crossed B^with^I the Sc + Sb - B^CCM1^I - ρ⁰ strain and the tetrads from the cross were analyzed . A non - Mendelian 4 : 0 segregation pattern B^for^I improved respiration is expected if the suppressor mutation is in mtDNA ( left panel ) . Otherwise , a 2 : 2 segregation pattern would be observed if the rescue effect involved a single nuclear mutation ( right panel ) . 
 ( A ) Reconstituted Sb - B^CCM1^I mutants B^can^I rescue the incompatibility of Sb - B^CCM1^I . Among 94 suppressor clones , 20 of them carry mutations in the Sb - B^CCM1^I gene . These mutants were reconstructed in Sc + Sb - B^CCM1^I cells to test their function . Superscripts next to Sb - B^CCM1^I indicate the respective amino acid substitutions and numbers in parentheses indicate the number of independent clones in our suppressor screen . Sc , wild - type S . cerevisiae . 
 ( C ) The 400th residue plays a determinant role in the S . cerevisiae - S . bayanus incompatibility . Both Sb - B^CCM1^I E375Q and Sb - B^CCM1^I D400N mutants relieved the incompatibility in S . cerevisiae , B^but^I only Sb - B^CCM1^I D400N caused respiration defects in S . bayanus . The Sb - B^CCM1^I E375Q mutant B^was^I selected as a control in this experiment since it B^was^I a charged - to - polar substitution similar to Sb - B^CCM1^I D400N and also appeared three times in our screen . Sb , wild - type S . bayanus . 
 ( D ) Protein structural analysis shows that all intramolecular suppressor mutations were located on the predicted B^PPR^I motifs . The predicted protein structure of Ccm1 is shown at left . Blue and green colors indicate the two α - helices in each predicted B^PPR^I motif and B^white^I color indicates additional α - helices in the N - terminus and the middle region . Red color indicates the positions of the suppressor mutations . Predicted B^PPR^I motifs occupy around 52 % of the whole protein ( 453 of 871 residues ) . The box at right displays a magnified version of some B^PPR^I motifs where the substitutions are located .

C ) Left panel : Schematic representation showing relevant genomic structure of the strain used to assess intra - chromosomal repair . The location of a B^MAT^I specific probe and the restriction endonuclease cleavage sites used B^for^I Southern B^blot^I analysis to detect repair product formation are indicated . Arrow depicts the localization of the B^double^I - strand break . Right panel : Physical analysis of intra - chromosomal repair in wild - type and B^cdc14^I - 1 cultures at the semipermisive temperature . After B^DSB^I formation by the expression of the B^HO^I , glucose B^was^I added to repress it , thus allowing repair B^with^I HM donor sequences . Genomic DNA B^was^I digested B^with^I StyI , separated on agarose gel and blotted . Blots were hybridized B^with^I a probe corresponding to the MATa - distal sequence . A second probe B^for^I the B^actin^I gene B^was^I used to control the amount of genomic DNA loaded at each time - point . Immunoblot analysis of Rad53 during mating type switching experiments is shown . Coomassie B^blue^I staining is depicted as loading control . Graphs show quantification of gene conversion ( GC ) leading to the re - establishment of MATa or switching to B^MAT^I and B^DSB^I formation . The data B^was^I normalized B^with^I the B^actin^I loading control . Graphs show the mean ± S . D . from three independent experiments . Replicates were averaged and statistical significance of differences assessed by a 2 - tailed unpaired Student t test . 
A ) Left panel : Schematic diagram displaying relevant genomic structure of the strains used to measure inter - chromosomal DNA repair efficiency . The location of a B^MAT^I specific probe and the restriction endonuclease cleavage sites used B^for^I Southern B^blot^I analysis to detect repair product formation are indicated . Note that crossover and non - crossover product have different restriction fragment sizes that B^can^I be differentiated in a Southern B^blot^I assay . Arrow depicts the localization of the B^double^I - strand break . Right panel : Physical analysis of wild - type and B^cdc14^I - 1 mutant strains carrying the inter - chromosomal gene conversion assay . Cells were grown overnight before adding galactose at semipermisive temperature to induce B^HO^I expression , thus producing a B^DSB^I on chromosome V . Samples were taken at different time - points , genomic DNA B^was^I extracted , digested B^with^I EcoRI and analysed by Southern B^blot^I . Blots were hybridized B^with^I a MATa - only DNA sequence and an B^actin^I probe B^was^I used as loading control . Asterisk denotes an overexposed film to visualize crossover formation . Immunoblot of Rad53 B^was^I performed as previously described . Coomassie staining is shown as a control B^for^I loading . Graphs show the mean ± S . D . of gene conversion , B^DSB^I induction and crossover vs non - crossover ratio from three independent experiments . All data B^was^I normalized using B^actin^I as loading control . Replicates were averaged and statistical significance of differences assessed by a 2 - tailed unpaired Student t test . 
B ) Left panel : Schematic representation depicting the genomic structure of the strains used to evaluate repair pathway choice . The location of a B^MAT^I specific probe and the restriction endonuclease cleavage sites used B^for^I Southern B^blot^I analysis to detect repair product formation are indicated . Note that the use of NHEJ or B^HR^I generates different product that B^can^I be recognized in Southern blots by the different disposition of the restriction sites B^for^I the endonucleases used . Arrow depicts the localization of the B^double^I - strand break . Right panel : Physical analysis of wild - type and B^cdc14^I - 1 cells harbouring the repair pathway choice assay . Cells were grown overnight and B^HO^I induction B^was^I attained through addition of galactose B^for^I 1 . 5 hour at semipermisive temperature . After induction of the B^HO^I , glucose B^was^I added to repress the B^HO^I expression and samples were taken to analyse repair efficiency . DNA B^was^I extracted , digested B^with^I EcoRV , separated on agarose gels and blotted . Blots were hybridized B^with^I a probe corresponding to the MATa - only DNA sequence . A second probe to the B^HIS3^I gene B^was^I used to control the amount of genomic DNA loaded at each time - point . Graphs show quantification of mating type switching by gene conversion ( B^HR^I ) , restoration of MATa ( NHEJ ) and the kinetics of the B^DSB^I induction . All data B^was^I normalized B^with^I the B^HIS3^I gene . Graphs show the mean ± S . D . from three independent experiments . Replicates were averaged and statistical significance of differences assessed by a 2 - tailed unpaired Student t test .

Cnm67 B^was^I used as SPB reporter to determine spindle length . Scale B^bar^I : 3μm . Detection of B^Net1^I phosphorylation levels B^was^I achieved by using Phos - B^tag^I polyacrylamide gels . Coomassie staining is showed as loading control .

A ) Identification of Cdc14 phospho - targets during the DNA damage response by mass spectrometry analysis . Wild - type and B^cdc14^I - 1 cells were grown overnight and blocked in B^G2^I / M by using nocodazole to avoid cell cycle - dependent changes in protein phosphorylation between both strains . After the block B^was^I attained , cells were transferred to 37ºC B^for^I 45 minutes to deplete Cdc14 activity prior B^HO^I induction by galactose addition B^for^I 4h . Differential phosphorylation of phospho - peptides detected between the wild - type and B^cdc14^I - 1 were grouped into broad categories depending on the molecular function of the proteins . The table includes the DNA damage and checkpoint - related proteins B^with^I Cdc14 - dependent hyper - phosphorylated status and the relative ratio between the wild - type and B^cdc14^I - 1 during the DNA damage response . Red and B^blue^I indicate relative amount of the residue phosphorylation between both strains ( Red , high ; Blue , low ) . 
B ) Cdc14 dephosphorylates Spc110 in response to a B^DSB^I . Spc110 B^was^I tagged B^with^I the 6 B^HA^I epitope in wild - type , B^cdc14^I - 1 and spc110 B^S36^I - 91A backgrounds . Proteins were TCA extracted , separated on Phos - B^Tag^I containing gels and blotted . Coomassie staining is shown as loading control .

Fluorescence intensities were expressed as arbitrary units ( A . F . U . ) and displayed both as a distribution and as mean values ± s . e . m . 
 ( B ) WT and B^MPS^I - IIIA hippocampal neurons ( DIV14 ) were transfected B^with^I v - B^Glut1^I - pHluorin - mCherry plasmid and synaptic recycling B^was^I evaluated by the fluorescence change of the probe from 80 - 100 individual boutons ( taken from 4 - 5 coverslips B^for^I each group ) . Values were displayed both as fluorescence traces ( means ± s . e . m . at each time frame ) and maximum fluorescence after KCl perfusion ( means ± s . e . m . ) . Representative panels on the right show the fluorescence intensity change in control neurons ( WT ) . Pseudo - colour B^was^I applied to better reveal fluorescence changes . Note that NH4Cl alkalinizes all vesicles revealing the total ( recycling + resting ) pool in neuronal cells analyzed .

A . Hcp release assay . B^HA^I - tagged Hcp ( Hcp B^HA^I ) release B^was^I assessed by separating cells ( C ) and cell - free culture supernatant ( S ) fractions from 109 wild - type ( WT ) , Δ B^tssM^I cells or Δ B^tssM^I cells carrying the AHT - inducible FLAG - tagged B^tssM^I - borne plasmid ( B^tssM^I + ) treated ( bulgecin ) or B^not^I ( B^NT^I ) B^with^I bulgecin A prior to B^tssM^I gene induction . Proteins were separated by 12 . 5 % - acrylamide B^SDS^I - PAGE and the periplasmic TolB protein ( control B^for^I cell lysis ) , Hcp B^HA^I and FL TssM were immunodetected using anti - TolB ( middle panel ) , anti - B^HA^I ( lower panel ) and anti - FLAG ( upper panel ) antibodies . Molecular weight markers ( in kDa ) are indicated on the left . The experiment B^was^I performed in duplicate and a representative result is shown . 
B . Hcp release assay . Molecular weight markers ( in kDa ) are indicated on the left . The experiment B^was^I performed in duplicate and a representative result is shown .

A . Hcp release assay . B . Anti - bacterial activity . E . coli K - 12 prey cells ( W3110 B^gfp^I + , B^kanR^I ) were mixed B^with^I the indicated attacker cells , spotted onto Sci - 1 inducing medium ( B^SIM^I ) agar plates and incubated B^for^I 4 hours at 37 °C . The image of a representative bacterial B^spot^I and the average and standard deviation ( n = 3 ) of the relative fluorescence of the bacterial mixture ( in arbitrary unit , AU ) are shown in the upper graph . The number of recovered E . coli prey cells ( counted on selective kanamycin medium ) is indicated in the lower graph ( in log10 of colony - forming unit ( cfu ) ) . The black , dark grey and B^light^I grey circles indicate values from three independent assays , and the average is indicated by the B^bar^I . The experiment B^was^I performed in triplicate and a representative result is shown . Asterisks indicate significant differences compared to the wild - type attacker strain ( B^NS^I , non significant ; * * * , p < 0 . 001 ) . 
A - B . Bacterial two - hybrid assay . BTH101 reporter cells producing the indicated proteins or domains fused to the B^T18^I or T25 domain of the Bordetella adenylate cyclase were spotted on X - B^Gal^I indicator plates . The B^blue^I color of the colony reflects the interaction between the two proteins . TolB and Pal are two proteins known to interact B^but^I unrelated to the T6SS or the MltE proteins . The experiment B^was^I performed in triplicate and a representative result is shown . 
C . Co - immunoprecipitation assay . The solubilized lysates from 2×1010 E . coli K - 12 W3110 cells co - producing the indicated FLAG - tagged TssM P variants ( exported in the periplasm ) and VSV - G - tagged MltE protein ( Total , T ) were subjected to immune precipitation on anti - FLAG - coupled agarose beads . The immunoprecipitated material ( B^IP^I ) B^was^I subjected to 12 . 5 % - acrylamide B^SDS^I - PAGE and immunodetected B^with^I anti - FLAG ( upper panel , TssM domains ) and anti - VSV - G ( lower panel , MltE ) antibodies . Molecular weight markers ( in kDa ) are indicated on the left . The experiment B^was^I performed in triplicate and a representative result is shown . 
A . Remazol brilliant B^blue^I assay . The absorbance of supernatants from the reaction containing purified and RBB - labelled E . coli peptidoglycan and the indicated protein ( 50 µg ) were measured at = 595 nm after incubation B^for^I 0 . 5 or 4 hours at 37 °C . The results shown are the average and standard deviation from triplicate reactions ( n = 3 ) . Asterisks indicate significant differences compared to the buffer ( B^NS^I , non significant ; * * , p < 0 . 01 ; * * * , p < 0 . 001 ) . The supernatant of the reaction after 4 hours of incubation is shown on bottom . 
B . Peptidoglycan hydrolysis . The decrease of the absorbance of the M . luteus peptidoglycan suspension in presence of the indicated protein ( 50 µg ) B^was^I measured at = 600 nm at 37 °C over time . The experiment B^was^I performed in triplicate and a representative result is shown . 
A - B . Co - immunoprecipitation assay . The solubilized lysates from 2×1010 EAEC wild - type or ∆ B^mltE^I cells producing FLAG - tagged TssM ( FL TssM ) and / or B^HA^I - tagged TssJ ( TssJ B^HA^I , panel A ) or TssL ( TssL B^HA^I , panel B ) ( Total , T ) were subjected to immune precipitation on anti - FLAG - coupled agarose beads . Molecular weight markers ( in kDa ) are indicated on the left . The experiments were performed in triplicate and a representative result is shown . 
C . B^BS3^I cross - linking assay . 2×109 cells of the indicated strain producing FLAG - tagged TssM ( B^with^I the exception of ∆ B^tssM^I cells ) were treated ( + ) or B^not^I ( - ) B^with^I the B^BS3^I cross - linker agent . After the cross - linking reaction , cells were boiled in Laemmli buffer and total proteins were subjected to 7 % - acrylamide B^SDS^I - PAGE and immunodetected B^with^I anti - FLAG antibodies . The TssM protein ( FL TssM ) and its complexes ( * , TssM - TssJ ; * * , TssM - TssL ) are indicated on the right as well as the TssM dimer ( arrow ) . Molecular weight markers ( in kDa ) are indicated on the left . The experiment B^was^I performed in triplicate and a representative result is shown .

A . U6A cells expressing wild - type or T387A B^STAT2^I were treated B^with^I IFN - β ( 100 IU / ml ) . Cells were harvested after 4 h and total RNAs were analyzed by real - time B^PCR^I . Values are the means ± B^SD^I from three independent experiments . 
B . U6A cells expressing wild - type , T387A , or T387D B^STAT2^I were treated B^with^I IFN - β ( 100 IU / ml ) . Cells were harvested after 4 h and total RNAs were analyzed by real - time B^PCR^I . Values are the means ± B^SD^I from three independent experiments . 
C , D . U6A cells expressing wild - type or T387A B^STAT2^I were treated B^with^I IFN - β B^for^I 0 , 4 , 8 , or 24 h . Total RNAs were analyzed by using an Illumina HumanHT - 12 v4 Expression BeadChip array . The average signal B^for^I each probe B^was^I used to determine expression levels . Genes B^with^I average signals below 25 and detection P values greater than 0 . 01 in the untreated or treated cells were excluded from the analysis . Inductions of less than 2 - fold were B^not^I scored . The Venn diagram shows the numbers of genes induced by 1 . 2 fold or more in U6A cells expressing T387A B^STAT2^I , relative to untreated control cells . The numbers in the table are fold changes calculated from the ratios T387A B^STAT2^I treated / untreated and wild - type B^STAT2^I treated / untreated . 
A . HME cells expressing wild - type , T387A , or T387D B^STAT2^I were seeded in 96 - well plates at 8000 cells / well . After 20 h , the amounts of the VSV - M and B^STAT2^I proteins were analyzed by the Western method .

The cells were then exposed to different multiplicities of infection of VSV B^for^I 2 h , followed by fresh media containing 10 IU / ml of IFN - β . The cells were analyzed by staining B^with^I crystal violet ( B ) after 48 h .

Cell survival B^was^I analyzed by the MTT assay . Each experiment B^was^I carried B^out^I two independent times , B^with^I results similar to the representative examples that are shown .

A ) Three - dimensional digital reconstructions of optical sections through immunofluorescently stained mesenteric resistance arteries from wild type , B^Tek^I - Cre : : B^Lama5^I - / - and B^Lama4^I - / - mice , and optical sections through vessel walls to show the endothelial and underlying smooth muscle layers . DAPI staining permits identification of endothelial cell nuclei , which lie perpendicular to the nuclei of the smooth muscle cells . Laminin α5 is absent from endothelial basement membranes of B^Tek^I - Cre : : B^Lama5^I - / - arteries ( arrow ) B^but^I is still present in smooth muscle basement membranes ( asterisk ) , while laminin α4 is still detectable in both endothelial and smooth muscle basement membranes . B^Lama4^I - / - arteries lack laminin α4 in both endothelial ( arrow ) and smooth muscle ( asterisk ) basement membranes , B^but^I laminin α5 is still detectable . Scale bars are 10 μm . 
B ) Scanning electron microscopy images of endothelial cell - B^denuded^I mesenteric resistance arteries show a comparable topography of the endothelial basement B^membrane^I in wild type , B^Tek^I - Cre : : B^Lama5^I - / - and B^Lama4^I - / - arteries . The arrows indicate artificial ruptures due to preparation procedure . Scale bars are 100 nm . 
C ) Intravital microscopic quantification of mesenteric arteries sizes in vivo show smaller diameters ( - 24 . 3 % ) in B^Tek^I - Cre : : B^Lama5^I - / - arteries and larger diameters ( + 27 . 6 % ) in B^Lama4^I - / - arteries compared to wild type controls . Auto - fluorescence of the internal elastic lamina allowed a good approximation of mesenteric arteries lumen diameter . Scale B^bar^I is 100 µm . Data are means ± s . e . m from a minimum of 4 first order mesenteric arteries imaged at least in 4 mice B^per^I genotype . * P < 0 . 05 unpaired t - test .

A ) A dual pipette - pulling assay B^was^I employed to measure cell - cell adhesion strength in HUAECs bound to laminin - coated beads ( asterisk ) or in the absence of beads . Scale B^bar^I is 10 µm . B ) Quantification shows higher adhesion strength between cells bound to laminin 511 - coated beads compared to laminin 111 - coated beads or cells B^not^I incubated B^with^I beads . Measurements could B^not^I be made B^with^I cells incubated B^with^I laminin 411 - coated beads since it B^was^I impossible to find cell - bead complexes . Values are means ± s . e . m from 15 cells from 3 independent experiments , unpaired t - test B^with^I Welch ' s correction . 
C ) Dual pipette - pulling assay performed in the presence of VE - cadherin blocking antibody , isotope control and soluble laminin 511 , showing almost complete ablation of adhesion strength in the presence of the blocking antibody in all conditions . Similar adhesion strengths were measured between cells in the presence of soluble laminin 511 and cells bound to laminin 511 - coated beads . 
D ) Adhesion strength in the presence of soluble laminin 511 B^was^I significantly reduced in the presence of integrin β1 blocking antibody ; cell - cell adhesion strength between cells bound to laminin 511 coated beads B^was^I significantly reduced in the presence of B^ROCK^I , B^SRC^I or FAK inhibitors . Values are means ± s . e . m from 11 cells from 3 independent experiments , unpaired t - test B^with^I Welch ' s correction . * P < 0 . 05 , * * P < 0 . 01 , * * * P < 0 . 001 , * * * * P < 0 . 0001 , n . s . = B^not^I significant , n . d . = B^not^I determined .

Scale B^bar^I is 10 µm . B ) Quantification of VE - cadherin positive vesicles / cell in HUAECs plated on laminin 411 , 511 or 111 . Values are means ± s . e . m from 300 cells from 3 independent experiments , unpaired t - test .

G . A . B^CD34^I + α6 + HFSCs and B^CD34^I ¯ α6 + non - HFSCs were B^FACS^I - purified from total epidermis ( d0 ) to ≥98 % purity B^post^I sorting ( d0 B^post^I - sort ) , and grown 14 days in 3C cultures ( d14 3C ) . A representative of 3 independent experiments is shown ( mean ±SD ) .

D - E . Simulated population proportions of B^CD34^I + α6 + HFSCs ( D ) and B^CD34^I ¯ α6 + non - HFSCs ( E ) from the mathematical model describing behavior of pure cell populations . The model parameters were estimated from the experimental data in B - C ( shown in grey as reference ) . 
G . Lineage tracing of B^FACS^I - purified B^CD34^I + α6 + HFSCs and B^CD34^I ¯ α6 + non - HFSCs from EGFP ¯ and EGFP + 3C cultures , respectively . Presence of B^CD34^I + α6 + EGFP + cells in cultures at d10 indicates non - HFSC to HFSC interconversion . 
H . Lineage tracing as in ( F ) shows that 3C cultures reach equilibrium between day 6 and 10 independent of the initial proportions of HFSCs and non - HFSCs . 
I . Quantification of the proportion of B^CD34^I + α6 + cells that maintain their fate over time ( experiments B^with^I both EGFP + or EGFP ¯ labeled cells are indicated ) .

A - B . Inhibitor treatment scheme ( A ) and B^FACS^I plots ( B ) of 3C cultures treated B^with^I the B^Shh^I inhibitor cyclopamine or the B^BMP^I inhibitor dorsomorphin ( mean ±SD ; n = 3 ) . C . Quantification of experiments as in ( B ) shows enrichment of HFSCs upon cyclopamine ( Cyclo ) treatment , whereas dorsomorphin ( Dorso ) treatment leads to depletion of HFSCs ( mean ±SD ; n = 3 ; * p ≤ 0 . 05 , Kruskal - Wallis ) . 
D . Heatmap of significantly ( padj value < 0 . 05 ) differentially expressed genes from RNAseq analysis of 3C cultures treated B^with^I Cyclo or Dorso B^for^I 48h . HFSC identity genes ( triangles ) and genes implicated in HFSC lineage progression ( circles ) are indicated .

F . RT - qPCR analysis of 3C cultures treated as in ( A ) shows upregulation of HFSC identity genes upon cyclopamine treatment whereas regulators of HFSC quiescence are downregulated upon dorsomorphin treatment ( mean ±SEM ; n = 4 ; * p ≤ 0 . 05 , * * p ≤ 0 . 01 , Kruskal - Wallis ) .

A magnified image of the dashed B^square^I is shown in the inset . Scale bars = 2 µm . 
 ( F ) GOMED - mediated degradation of ( pro ) insulin by glucose deprivation of Atg5 KO MIN6 cells . Atg5 KO MIN6 cells were incubated in glucose - depleted medium in the absence or presence of bafilomycin A1 ( 10 nM ) for the indicated times . The cell lysates were then subjected to immunoblot analysis using an anti - ( B^pro^I ) insulin antibody . 
 ( G ) Immunofluorescence analysis of ( pro ) insulin and Lamp2 . Atg5 KO MIN6 cells were left untreated ( NT ) or subjected to glucose deprivation for 1 hr in the presence of E64d ( 25 µM ) or bafilomycin A1 ( 10 nM ) , and were stained with anti - ( pro ) insulin and anti - Lamp2 ( lysosomal marker ) antibodies and observed by fluorescence microscopy . Scale bar = 1 µm . Arrowheads indicate the colocalization of ( pro ) insulin B^with^I GOMED structures . 
 ( A−D ) EM analysis demonstrated the induction of GOMED . Primary B^Atg7^I KO β - cells were subjected to glucose deprivation B^for^I 1 hr . A representative B^AP^I - like structure containing insulin granule is shown in ( A ) . An AL - like structure containing insulin granules is shown in ( B ) . Scale bars = 0 . 2 µm . 
 ( A−D ) EM analysis demonstrated the induction of GOMED . Primary B^Atg7^I KO β - cells were subjected to glucose deprivation B^for^I 1 hr . ( C , D ) GOMED structures containing Golgi vesicles . An B^AP^I - like structure containing multiple Golgi vesicles ( arrows ) ( C ) and an AL - like structure fusing B^with^I a lysosome ( arrowhead ) ( D ) are shown . Scale B^bar^I = 0 . 5 µm . A magnified image of the dashed rectangle is shown in the inset . Scale B^bar^I = 0 . 2 µm . B^AP^I - like structure contained B^double^I - B^membrane^I .

Key residues involved in stabilizing the templating base ( Y505 and R517 ) are shown in black . 
 ( C ) ( Left panel ) 8 - oxo - dG ( green ) preferentially adopts the B^pro^I - mutagenic B^syn^I - conformation . A simulated annealing Fo - Fc omit density B^map^I is shown B^for^I 8 - oxo - dG ( contoured at 3σ ) . ( Right panel ) 8 - oxo - dG ( anti ) ( black , modeled using 2PFO ) B^was^I overlayed B^with^I the Fo - Fc omit density B^map^I . In the anti - conformation , the C8 - carbonyl would directly clash B^with^I the 5′ - phosphate ( B^red^I - B^dotted^I line ) . 
 ( D ) 8 - oxo - dG ( B^syn^I ) ( green ) is stabilized by multiple interactions , including Tyr505 and Arg517 ( grey ) . 
 ( B ) Overview of the 8 - oxo - dG : dATP insertion complex . The 39 - kDa catalytic domain ( 8 - kDa subdomain B^not^I shown B^for^I clarity ) is colored by subdomain : fingers ( salmon ) , B^palm^I ( yellow ) and thumb ( purple ) . The B^polymerase^I is in complex B^with^I a 1 - nt gapped 16 - B^mer^I oligo ( grey ) containing a templating 8 - oxo - dG ( green ) . The primer terminal ddC and the incoming ddCTP are shown in cyan and magenta , respectively . Key residues that form the nascent base pair binding pocket ( N513 and R517 ) and are involved in catalysis ( D427 , D429 and D490 ) are shown in black . The catalytic metal A and the nucleotide binding metal B are shown in B^red^I and neon , respectively . 
 ( C ) 8 - oxo - dG ( green ) establishes a Watson - Crick pair B^with^I ddCTP ( magenta ) . Binding of the 8 - oxo - dG in the anti - conformation is only possible because the C8 - carbonyl is B^far^I enough away B^not^I to clash B^with^I the 5′ - phosphate . Asn513 and Arg517 ( purple ) interact B^with^I the minor groove of the nascent base pair . The base pair geometry ( C1′ distance and λ angles ) is indicated at the bottom of the figure . A simulated annealing Fo - Fc omit density B^map^I B^for^I the pair is also shown ( contoured at 3σ ) . 
 ( D ) Overlay of the primer terminus and active site B^with^I an undamaged reference structure ( 2PFO , black ) . The catalytic aspartic acids are shown in yellow , the primer terminus in cyan and the incoming dATP in magenta . A water molecule ( B^red^I ) and Mg2 + ( neon ) are occupying the metal A and metal B sites , respectively . 
 ( B ) Overview of the 8 - oxo - dG : dATP insertion complex . The 39 - kDa catalytic domain ( 8 - kDa subdomain B^not^I shown B^for^I clarity ) is colored by subdomain : fingers ( salmon ) , B^palm^I ( yellow ) and thumb ( purple ) . Key residues that form the nascent base pair binding pocket ( N513 and R517 ) and are involved in catalysis ( D427 , D429 and D490 ) are shown in black . The catalytic metal A and the nucleotide binding metal B are shown in B^red^I and neon , respectively .

 ( A and B ) Overlay of the nascent base pair in the insertion structures B^with^I an undamaged reference structure ( 2PFO , black ) . Binding of 8 - oxo - dG ( green ) in both the anti - ( A ) or B^syn^I - ( B ) conformation involves a repositioning of the 5′ - phosphate ( B^red^I arrow ) . Furthermore , the Arg514 B^side^I chain ( purple ) that normally stacks B^with^I the templating base and interacts B^with^I the 5′ - phosphate ( B^blue^I - B^dotted^I line ) , also repositions ( black arrow ) . In both structures , Arg514 interacts B^with^I the B^C6^I - carbonyl of the templating 8 - oxo - dG ( anti ) ( A ) or the B^C6^I - amino group of the incoming dATP ( B ) . The incoming nucleotide is shown in magenta . 
 ( B ) Overview of the 8 - oxo - dG : dC extension complex . The 39 - kDa catalytic domain ( 8 - kDa subdomain B^not^I shown B^for^I clarity ) is colored by subdomain : fingers ( salmon ) , B^palm^I ( yellow ) and thumb ( purple ) . Key residues that form the primer terminal base pair binding pocket ( N513 , R517 and Glu529 ) and are involved in catalysis ( D427 , D429 and D490 ) are shown in black . The nucleotide binding metal ( B ) is shown in neon . 
 ( C ) 8 - oxo - dG ( orange ) establishes a Watson - Crick base pair B^with^I dC ( cyan ) at the primer terminus . Tyr505 , Arg517 , and Glu529 ( purple ) interact B^with^I the minor groove of the base pair . The base pair geometry ( C1′ distance and λ angles ) is indicated at the bottom of the figure . A simulated annealing Fo - Fc omit density B^map^I B^for^I the pair is also shown ( contoured at 3σ ) . 
 ( D ) Overlay of the primer terminus and active site B^with^I an undamaged reference structure ( 2PFO , black ) . The catalytic aspartic acids are shown in yellow , incoming dUMPNPP in magenta , and primer terminal dC in cyan . Expectedly , Mg2 + ( neon ) is occupying the metal B site . However , the metal A is absent in the structure , resulting in a non - catalytic position of the 3′ - OH . This is consistent B^with^I other structures containing an incoming non - hydrolyzable analog .

Data represent mean ± SEM of triplicate values and are representative of three independent experiments . * * * P < 0 . 001 . A two - way ANOVA and the Bonferroni B^post^I - test were performed .

I - I ' . Acoustic startle reflex measurements of ( I ) live , intact , 5 - dpf control ( n = 20 ) and B^wrb^I pwi / pwi ( n = 18 ) zebrafishlarva , where almost 100 % of the larva responded to five successive acoustic stimuli at 3 seconds intervals . In B^wrb^I pwi / pwi animals , only 39 % of larva responded to the first stimulus , thereafter , the number of responding larva decreased rapidly to less than 6 % . ( I ' ) Acoustic startle reflexes of 5 - dpf zebrafish larva after injection B^with^I either EGFP capped mRNA ( control , n = 16 , or B^wrb^I pwi / pwi n = 17 ) , B^Wrb^I - EGFP capped mRNA ( control , n = 20 , or B^wrb^I pwi / pwi n = 20 ) or two different concentrations of otoferlin mRNA ( 1x : control , n = 13 ; B^wrb^I pwi / pwi n = 11 ; 2x : control , n = 16 ; B^wrb^I pwi / pwi n = 6 ) . In contrast to EGFP mRNA injection , B^Wrb^I - EGFP as well as otoferlin mRNAs could partially rescue the acoustic startle reflex in the mutants , while B^not^I displaying detrimental effects on overall zebrafish morphology and development . Please note the dose - dependent effect of otoferlin mRNA injection . Similar results as in 1x EGFP mRNA were also obtained from injection of 2X EGFP mRNA as control ( data B^not^I shown ) . Measurements from two ( 2x otoferlin ) or three ( all other ) different experiments were compiled in the graph .

G . Illustration of the stimulus paradigm B^for^I forward masking experiments : a 100 ms masker tone presented at CF , 30 dB above threshold B^was^I followed by a silent interval of variable duration and a 15 ms probe tone ( CF , 30 dB above threshold ) . D - E . Cochlear microphonic potentials ( B^CM^I ) , summating potential ( B^SP^I ) and compound action potential ( B^CAP^I ) recorded through transtympanic electrocochleography ( ECochG ) in response to clicks at decreasing stimulus intensities are superimposed on the corresponding potentials recorded from one normally - hearing control ( range as measured at 120 dB 4 . 31 - 28 . 02 µV in 20 normally - hearing children ) . Means and standard errors of peak latency and amplitude are also reported B^for^I each potential category . The ECochG waveform resulting from B^CM^I cancellation in the control begins B^with^I an abrupt negative deflection , the B^SP^I , followed by a negative peak , the neural B^CAP^I . In the child B^with^I the B^OTOF^I TMD mutation , the ECochG responses begin B^with^I a rapid negative deflection that peaks at the same latency as the B^SP^I in the control and has comparable amplitude . This is followed by a low - amplitude negative potential that peaks at the same B^CAP^I in controls B^but^I shows a markedly prolonged duration . In all graphs time " 0 " refers to B^CM^I onset . R : right , L : left . F . Means and standard errors of peak latency and amplitude are reported B^for^I each potential category .

Data are expressed as means ± SEM . * * or $ $ p < 0 . 01 . * saline vs icv B^CCL2^I injection in WT mice . $ icv B^CCL2^I injection in WT mice vs B^CCL2^I + INCB3344 icv injection in WT mice or icv B^CCL2^I injection in B^CCR2^I KO mice . 
A . Colocalization of B^MCH^I and the receptor B^for^I B^CCL2^I ( B^CCR2^I ) in the LHA of mice expressing B^CFP^I under the promoter of B^MCH^I . The overlap of B^MCH^I and B^CCR2^I immunoreactivity indicates that B^CCR2^I is expressed on B^MCH^I neurons in the LHA .

The B^CCR2^I antagonist INCB3344 prevents the small hyperpolarization of B^MCH^I neurons elicited by B^CCL2^I .

B , D . B^CCL2^I effects on B^MCH^I neurons of B^MCH^I - B^CFP^I knock - in mice recorded in current - clamp mode . The control trace is recorded just before the application of B^CCL2^I while the B^CCL2^I trace is recorded 1 B^min^I after the beginning of B^CCL2^I application . B^CCL2^I delayed the third action potential ( left panel ) and induced failures in the action potential evoked in the right panel . 
E . Effect of B^CCL2^I on KCl - induced B^MCH^I release . The perifusion of hypothalamic tissues B^with^I 60mM KCl B^for^I 30 B^min^I induces an up to 3 . 1 - fold increase in B^MCH^I release . B^CCL2^I ( 100 nM ) dramatically blunts KCl - induced B^MCH^I release , an effect partially by the addition of INCB3344 ( 10µM ) ( 3 to 5 independent experiments , 3 chambers B^per^I condition in each experiment ) . * or $ p < 0 . 05 , * * p < 0 . 01 , * * * p < 0 . 001 . * KCl vs KCl + B^CCL2^I conditions . $ KCl + B^CCL2^I vs KCl + B^CCL2^I + INCB3344 conditions . Data are expressed as mean fold - increase in B^MCH^I release B^per^I chamber vs basal secretion , ± SEM . 
F . Effect on B^MCH^I - B^R1^I antagonist on LPS - and B^CCL2^I - induced weight loss . Data are expressed in mean % of weight variation compared to initial body weight at different times ( from 2 to 48h ) after acute icv injection of saline ( black B^bar^I ) , H6408 ( dark B^blue^I B^bar^I ) , LPS ( B^red^I B^bar^I ) , or LPS + H6408 ( B^light^I B^red^I B^bar^I ) , B^CCL2^I ( orange B^bar^I ) , B^CCL2^I + H6408 ( yellow B^bar^I ) in WT mice ( n = 3 to 12 ) . Data are expressed as means ± SEM . * p < 0 . 05 , * * p < 0 . 01 , * * * p < 0 . 001 , color - coded asterisks indicate a significant difference from the experimental condition assigned to the respective color - coded B^bar^I .

 ( G ) Marble burying test . n = 9 B^for^I WT mice , n = 25 B^for^I KO mice . * , p < 0 . 05 , One - way ANOVA B^with^I Bonferroni ' s B^post^I B^hoc^I test ( F ( 1 , 32 ) = 5 . 39 ) . Data are presented as mean ± SEM . 
 ( H ) Forced swimming test . n = 10 B^for^I WT mice , n = 13 B^for^I KO mice . * * , p < 0 . 01 , * * * , p < 0 . 001 Two - way ANOVA followed by Scheffe ' s B^post^I - B^hoc^I test ( main effect of genotype F ( 1 , 42 ) = 84 . 30 , main effect of session F ( 1 , 42 ) = 33 . 88 , interaction F ( 1 , 42 ) = 4 . 92 ) . Data are presented as mean ± SEM . 
 ( I , J ) Light - dark test . Data are presented as mean ± SEM . 
 ( K ) Hot plate test . . n = 8 B^for^I WT mice , n = 12 B^for^I KO mice . * * , p < 0 . 01 , One - way ANOVA B^with^I Bonferroni ' s B^post^I B^hoc^I test ( F ( 1 , 18 ) = 17 . 51 ) . Data are presented as mean ± SEM .

G , Kinetics of hydrolysis of a synthetic substrate by B^PRL2^I shows burst kinetics . Addition of the wild - type B^CBS^I - pair domain B^but^I B^not^I the D426A mutant inhibits phosphatase activity . 
A , Treatment of B^PRL2^I B^with^I a synthetic substrate leads to complete phosphorylation of the catalytic residue , cysteine 101 . Recombinant B^PRL2^I B^was^I treated B^with^I 3 - O - methylfluorescein phosphate ( OMFP ) and analyzed by B^SDS^I - PAGE B^with^I the Phos - B^tag^I reagent . Phosphocysteine is hydrolyzed by boiling . 
B , Detection of phosphorylated by electrospray mass spectrometry . OMFP - treatment increased the mass of the intact protein by 79 . 99 amu B^but^I B^had^I no effect on the C101A mutant . 
C , 31P B^NMR^I spectrum of the thioPO3 signal from phosphocysteine in B^PRL2^I . The broad peak is TCEP in the buffer . 
D , Cysteine phosphorylated B^PRL2^I does B^not^I bind to B^CNNM3^I . Recombinant B^PRL2^I B^was^I phosphorylated by treatment B^with^I OMFP and subjected to pull - down by the B^CBS^I - pair domain of B^CNNM3^I as a B^GST^I fusion . Only unphosphorylated B^PRL2^I B^was^I observed in the pull - down lanes while phosphorylated B^PRL2^I B^was^I in the flow - through lanes . 
E , ITC measurement of the affinity of B^PRL2^I B^for^I the B^CNNM3^I B^GST^I - B^CBS^I - pair domain . Phosphorylation by OMFP completely blocked binding while oxidization of B^PRL2^I by diamide decreased the affinity 200 - fold . 
F , The cysteine residues in the B^PRL2^I active site are B^not^I required B^for^I binding the B^CNNM3^I B^CBS^I - pair domain . 
A , Mutations in the B^CBS^I - pair loop of B^CNNM4^I prevent binding to B^PRL3^I . Lysates of B^COS7^I cells transfected B^with^I the indicated constructs were subjected to immunoprecipitation ( B^IP^I ) and immunoblotting ( IB ) B^with^I the indicated antibodies .

B & C , Wild - type B^CNNM4^I - dependent magnesium efflux is inhibited by co - transfection by B^PRL3^I B^but^I the efflux by the B^CNNM4^I D485A mutant , which is unable to bind B^PRL3^I , is resistant to inhibition . A , The B^CBS^I - pair domain ( yellow ) forms a dimer and binds two molecules of B^PRL2^I via an B^extended^I loop . The positions of the B^PRL2^I C - terminal CAAX prenylation motif [ 42 ] and B^CNNM3^I N - terminus suggest that the B^membrane^I would B^sit^I above the complex . 
B , Contacts between the B^CNNM3^I B^CBS2^I loop and the B^PRL2^I active site . 
C , Stereoview of the 2FO - B^FC^I omit B^map^I of the B^PRL2^I binding loop of B^CNNM3^I contoured at 1 . 
D , Detail of complex B^with^I reduced B^PRL2^I , showing B^how^I B^CNNM3^I Asp426 inserts into the pocket adjacent to the catalytic cysteine Cys101 . 
E , Model of phosphocysteine preventing CNNM binding . Crystal structure of B^PRL1^I B^with^I a bound sulfate shows phosphocysteine would prevent Asp426 binding . Residues are numbered according to the B^PRL1^I structure ( PDB 1XM2 ) . 
A , PRLs expressed in HEK293 cells are intrinsically phosphorylated on cysteine . Phos - B^tag^I analysis of cell lysates shows close to 50 % of transiently expressed FLAG - B^PRL1^I , - 2 , and - 3 are phosphorylated . The phosphorylated B^PRL^I bands are marked by an asterisk . 
B , Immunoblots of B^PRL1^I expressed in HEK293 cells show phosphorylation requires the catalytic cysteine ( C104 ) B^but^I B^not^I the adjacent cysteine ( C49 ) in the active site . 
C , Co - immunoprecipitation of B^Myc^I - B^PRL^I by FLAG - CNNMs shows only the unphosphorylated forms of B^PRL1^I binds B^CNNM4^I . 
D , Endogenous PRLs in HeLa cells are cysteine phosphorylated .

A , B^ABR^I thresholds in B^Otof^I I515T / I515T ( B^red^I , n = 5 ) and B^Otof^I - / I515T ( B^blue^I , n = 7 ) mice were elevated compared to B^Otof^I + / + mice ( black , n = 5 ) at an age of 3 - 4 weeks . The grey B^dotted^I line indicates the maximum loudspeaker output of 90dB ; thresholds exceeding this value were B^set^I to 100dB B^for^I calculation of the mean ± SEM . At 12kHz , only the threshold increase B^for^I B^Otof^I - / I515T vs B^Otof^I + / + is significant ( Kruskal - Wallis test B^with^I Dunn ' s multiple comparisons test between all 3 groups ) . B , Grand averages of B^ABR^I waveforms ± SEM in response to 80dB click stimulation of the mice analyzed in A : The small wave preceding B^ABR^I wave I probably represents the summating potential ( B^SP^I , hair cell receptor potential ) , which is intact in B^Otof^I mutants . B^ABR^I wave I is reduced in amplitude while subsequent peaks are better preserved in B^Otof^I I515T / I515T mice ( Fig EV1 ) . C , Mean B^ABR^I wave I amplitude ± SEM B^for^I different stimulus intensities ( all differences between genotypes are significant ; 2 - way ANOVA B^with^I Tukey ' s multiple comparison test ) . D , At 8 weeks ( circles ) and 25 weeks ( open squares ) , B^Otof^I I515T / I515T mice showed highly elevated B^ABR^I thresholds compared to B^Otof^I + / + mice ( n = 7 - 8 each ; p < 0 . 001 at 12kHz , Mann - Whitney - U - test ) . Grey B^dotted^I line as in A . E , Grand averages of B^ABR^I waveforms ± SEM in response to 80dB Click stimulation in mice aged 8 weeks . A , Spontaneous rates of SGNs from B^Otof^I I515T / I515T ( B^red^I , n = 35 ) and B^Otof^I + / + littermates ( black , n = 39 ) were B^not^I significantly different ( p = 0 . 83 , Kolmogorov - Smirnov test ) . 
B - D , Averaged poststimulus time histograms ±SEM from B^Otof^I I515T / I515T mice ( n = 25 - 32 ) and B^Otof^I + / + littermate SGNs ( n = 13 - 27 ) to stimulation B^with^I 50ms tone bursts at the characteristic frequency ( CF ) of each B^fiber^I , 30dB above threshold at indicated stimulus rates . 
G , B^Spike^I rate increases B^with^I rising stimulus intensity were significantly shallower in B^Otof^I I515T / I515T SGNs , both B^for^I repetitive stimulation B^with^I 50ms tone bursts ( left , p = 0 . 014 , t - test ) and B^for^I continuous stimulation B^with^I amplitude modulated tones ( right , p < 0 . 001 , Mann - Whitney U test ) . 
H , Phase locking to amplitude modulated tones ( assessed as the maximal synchronization index ) B^was^I typically less precise in B^Otof^I I515T / I515T SGNs than in B^Otof^I + / + SGNs ( p = 0 . 09 , Mann - Whitney U test ) . 
I , 100ms masker tone and 15ms probe tones ( both at CF , 30dB above threshold ) were separated by silent intervals of variable duration . Inter - masker intervals were 500ms B^for^I B^Otof^I + / + , and 1000ms B^for^I B^Otof^I I515T / I515T . The ratio of probe and masker onset responses revealed enhanced B^RRP^I depletion after stimulation in B^Otof^I I515T / I515T ( pink ; mean ±SEM B^red^I ) compared to B^Otof^I + / + ( grey ; mean ±SEM black ; B^for^I 4ms interval : p = 0 . 001 , t - test ) and a slowed time course of recovery ( x : half time of recovery , taken from normalized recovery functions ; p < 0 . 001 , Mann - Whitney U test ) . 
K , Mice learned to drink water when continuous noise B^was^I present B^but^I avoided drinking when the noise B^was^I interrupted by silent gaps . 5 B^Otof^I I515T / I515T mice ( pink , mean ±SEM B^red^I ) avoided drinking less efficiently than 2 B^Otof^I + / + mice ( grey , mean ±SEM black ) B^for^I shorter B^gap^I durations . See also Figs B^S2^I / S3 .
